name: Sure Cuts A Lot Version 5 Project
summary: A SCUT5 file is a project created by Craft Edge Sure Cuts A Lot (version 5), an application for creating designs to produce signage with electronic cutting machines. It stores a design, which may include text, images, shapes, effects, and pencil, pen, and paintbrush strokes. Sure Cuts A Lot users save designs for various signage, such as decals and graphic displays, as SCUT5 files.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
